projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A simple app that searches through the api to find the city's weather forecast.  This project is from the Odin Project and it is used to practice and play around with the language that is being learned

projects.name: Todo List
projects.description: A simple to do list app.  It can create projects and add tasks.  It can also check the income projects and it tells you when a project is do today.

projects.name: Memory
projects.description: A simple game and first game I have created. Continue to practice fetching datas and playing around with the objects I have received.  Also, it is a good practice to play around with data structure

projects.name: CV Maker
projects.description: My first practical project for a company that I worked for.  It facilitates teachers to create an evaluation form and render to a customized form and save as PDF or print it out.

projects.description: My first practical project for a company that I worked for.  It facilitates teachers to create an evaluation form and render to a customized form and save as PDF or print it out.
